text: Kaoru Ishiguro (born 6 May 1933) is a Japanese wrestler. He competed in the men's freestyle heavyweight at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Japan Category:Wrestlers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Hokkaido
title: Kaoru Ishiguro
